title: Crockpot Cabbage Casserole
directions: In a very large pot, brown ground meat and onions with olive oil. (If you choose to use ground beef, you can omit the olive oil.)
Remove pot from heat and add cabbage, carrots, salt, and pepper. Stir to combine.
Place rice in the bottom of the crockpot.
Pour meat/cabbage mixture on top of rice.
Cover, and cook on “low” for 4-6 hours.
ingredients: 1 pound of ground beef or ground turkey
2 medium carrots, peeled and thinly sliced
3 cups beef broth or chicken broth
